mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_conversation (user_id, title, message_count, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{messageCount}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE ai_conversation SET title = #{title}, message_count = #{messageCount}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, title, message_count, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_conversation WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY update_time DESC
